7 void MSGtoPCL(const pc_msg_t& msg, pcPtr& cloud)
8 {
9  if (msg.data.size() > 0)
10  {
11  pcl::PCLPointCloud2 pcl_pc2;
12  pcPtr temp(new pc_t);
13  pcl_conversions::toPCL(msg, pcl_pc2);
14  pcl::fromPCLPointCloud2(pcl_pc2, *temp);
15  cloud = temp;
16  }
17 }

19 void colorize(pcPtr input, float ratio)
20 {
21  int r;
22  int g;
23  int b;
24 
25  int cycle = (int) (ratio * 6);
26  int up = (int) ((6 * ratio - cycle) * 255);
27  int down = 255 - up;
28 
29  switch(cycle)
30  {
31  case 0:
32  r = 255;
33  g = up;
34  b = 0;
35  break;
36  case 1:
37  r = down;
38  g = 255;
39  b = 0;
40  break;
41  case 2:
42  r = 0;
43  g = 255;
44  b = up;
45  break;
46  case 3:
47  r = 0;
48  g = down;
49  b = 255;
50  break;
51  case 4:
52  r = up;
53  g = 0;
54  b = 255;
55  break;
56  case 5:
57  r = 255;
58  g = 0;
59  b = down;
60  break;
61  }
62 
63  for (int i = 0; i < input->points.size(); i++)
64  {
65  input->points[i].r = r;
66  input->points[i].g = g;
67  input->points[i].b = b;
68  }
69 }

72 {}

74 Cloud::Cloud(ros::NodeHandle* node, string sub_name, string pub_name, bool icp)
75 {
76  this->name = pub_name;
77  this->icp = icp;
78  string topic = "/calib/clouds/" + pub_name;
79  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Init Cloud instance " << pub_name << ": " << sub_name);
80  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("\tpublish topic: " << topic);
81  this->node = node;
82  this->tf_listener = new tf::TransformListener;
83  this->frame = "world";
84  this->frame_pub = "cam_center";
85 
86  this->sub = this->node->subscribe(sub_name, 1, &Cloud::update, this);
87  this->pub_raw = this->node->advertise<pc_t>(topic, 1);
88 }
89 
90 void Cloud::conf_callback(calib::CloudConfig &config, uint32_t level)
91 {
92  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM_ONCE("Init " << this->name << " Cloud parameters");
93 
94  // transform
95  this->param_transform.tx = config.tx / 1000;
96  this->param_transform.ty = config.ty / 1000;
97  this->param_transform.tz = config.tz / 1000;
98  this->param_transform.rx = config.rx / 180 * 3.14159;
99  this->param_transform.ry = config.ry / 180 * 3.14159;
100  this->param_transform.rz = config.rz / 180 * 3.14159;
101 }

104  void Cloud::publish(ros::Publisher& pub, pc_t& cloud)
105  {
106  pc_msg_t msg;
107  pcl::toROSMsg(cloud, msg);
108  this->publish(pub, msg);
109  }

111  void Cloud::publish(ros::Publisher& pub, const pcConstPtr& cloudPtr)
112  {
113  pc_t cloud = *cloudPtr;
114  this->publish(pub, cloud);
115  }

117  void Cloud::publish(ros::Publisher& pub, const pc_msg_t& input)
118  {
119  pc_msg_t msg = input;
120  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(this->frame_pub, msg, msg, *this->tf_listener);
121 
122  if (msg.data.size() > 0)
123  {
124  pub.publish(msg);
125  }
126  }
127 
128 void Cloud::update(const pcConstPtr& input)
129 {
130  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Receiving " << input->points.size() << " points for " << this->name << "(" << this->frame << ").");
131  pc_t* cloud(new pc_t(*input));
132  pcPtr cloudPtr(cloud);
133 
134  if (this->icp)
135  {
136  tf::StampedTransform icp_tf;
137  tf_listener->waitForTransform("world", this->name + "_icp", ros::Time(0), ros::Duration(5.0));
138  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud("world", *cloud, *cloud, *this->tf_listener);
139  tf_listener->lookupTransform("world", this->name + "_icp", ros::Time(0), icp_tf);
140  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(*cloud, *cloud, icp_tf);
141  }
142 
143  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(this->frame, *cloud, *cloud, *this->tf_listener);
144  pcl_ros::transformPointCloud(*cloud, *cloud, this->get_transform(this->param_transform, true, true));
145  if (this->pub_raw.getTopic() != this->sub.getTopic())
146  {
147  ROS_DEBUG_STREAM("Publishing " << cloudPtr->points.size() << " for " << this->name << " raw point cloud " << "(" << this->frame_pub << ").");
148  this->publish(this->pub_raw, cloudPtr);
149  }
150  this->cloud = cloudPtr;
151 }
152 
153 tf::Transform Cloud::get_transform(param_transform_t params, bool rot, bool tr)
154 {
155  Eigen::Affine3d t = Affine3d::Identity();
156  tf::Transform transform;
157  if (tr)
158  {
159  t.translation() << params.tx, params.ty, params.tz;
160  }
161  if (rot)
162  {
163  t.rotate(AngleAxisd(params.rx, Vector3d::UnitX()));
164  t.rotate(AngleAxisd(params.ry, Vector3d::UnitY()));
165  t.rotate(AngleAxisd(params.rz, Vector3d::UnitZ()));
166  }
167  tf::transformEigenToTF(t, transform);
168  return transform;
169 }
170 
171 pcPtr Cloud::remove_nans(pcPtr cloudNans)
172 {
173  pcPtr cloud(new pc_t);
174  pcl::PointIndices::Ptr indices(new pcl::PointIndices);
175  pcl::removeNaNFromPointCloud(*cloudNans, indices->indices);
176  pcl::ExtractIndices<Point> rm_nan;
177  rm_nan.setInputCloud(cloudNans);
178  rm_nan.setIndices(indices);
179  rm_nan.setNegative(false);
180  rm_nan.filter(*cloud);
181 
182  return cloud;
183 }
